title: Login Page Wireframe
description: Provides a simple and user-friendly interface for users to log in to ArcadeDex.

components.name: Header
components.description: Includes logo and site navigation links.

components.name: Login Form
components.description: Contains fields for email and password, and a submit button.

components.name: Forgot Password Link
components.description: Link to navigate to the forgot password page.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Links to sign up page and terms of service.
